channel.title: April News - Alpha + Keys
channel.description: _Clickbaited by the word **keys**, eh? You're here, so you may as well read it!_ _"The Neutral King" by Adiart_ **Hi everyone --** we mostly update first via [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB), so some of this news may be a bit behind :slight_smile: * We have been updating like crazy. * We recently sent out a couple hundred Steam keys to **Esquire** backers with an early invite to Alpha! * We finished our Euro promo to get some more Euros on the same timezone. * [Polish Wikia](http://pl.tol.wikia.com) is getting a start-to-finish revamp by two awesome volunteers, @PerunPerunowy and @Eevee. * We successfully had our first 16-player game last night. * We discovered peak-time is, surprisingly, **9pm-5am EST** * Our **#looking-for-group** [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB) channel is getting popular! Type **?rank lfg** be be @pingable for a group! * Our end-game events are starting to work, which means stats and gp gains at the end of matches are starting to work _(although gp will reset later)_. * Lobby chat is coming soon! * There are TONS of Throne of Lies YouTube videos and Twitch streams about us! [Look us up](https://gaming.youtube.com/results?search_query=throne%20of%20lies)! * We added a new **Lorebot** to our Discord to start pulling feeds from the forum here - and it's actually posting in the correct categories~ * There are free keys given out all over the place! Mostly in Discord, YouTube and Twitch. Follow our Streamers/YouTubers **in yellow** on [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB) for the best chances of key giveaways! * The game is **mostly stable, now.** We're still working out a few kinks, but it's pretty good! * We're working ways to load between day/night faster. **WAY faster.** Oh my, a lot of good things lately and on the way.

item.title: April News - Alpha + Keys
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Clickbaited by the word keys, eh? You’re here, so you may as well read it!

“The Neutral King” by Adiart

Hi everyone – we mostly update first via Discord, so some of this news may be a bit behind

  • We have been updating like crazy.
  • We recently sent out a couple hundred Steam keys to Esquire backers with an early invite to Alpha!
  • We finished our Euro promo to get some more Euros on the same timezone.
  • Polish Wikia is getting a start-to-finish revamp by two awesome volunteers, @PerunPerunowy and @Eevee.
  • We successfully had our first 16-player game last night.
  • We discovered peak-time is, surprisingly, 9pm-5am EST
  • Our #looking-for-group Discord channel is getting popular! Type ?rank lfg be be @pingable for a group!
  • Our end-game events are starting to work, which means stats and gp gains at the end of matches are starting to work (although gp will reset later).
  • Lobby chat is coming soon!
  • There are TONS of Throne of Lies YouTube videos and Twitch streams about us! Look us up!
  • We added a new Lorebot to our Discord to start pulling feeds from the forum here - and it’s actually posting in the correct categories~
  • There are free keys given out all over the place! Mostly in Discord, YouTube and Twitch. Follow our Streamers/YouTubers in yellow on Discord for the best chances of key giveaways!
  • The game is mostly stable, now. We’re still working out a few kinks, but it’s pretty good!
  • We’re working ways to load between day/night faster. WAY faster.

Oh my, a lot of good things lately and on the way.

Read full topic
